short_description: EXFOLIATING SALT SCRUB - This exfoliator face, foot and hand scrub can gently exfoliate the skin and remove dry and dead skin cells. It is a great moisturizer for skin and can act as a cleanser for oily and acne prone skin. Gently buff away dead, dry skin, and reveal newer-looking skin underneath with this facial scrub and skin scrub.

Stimulating circulation, reducing skin inflammation, and helping skin retain moisture are just a few of the many benefits. Feel younger, feel better.

SUITABLE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES – Our exfoliating body, foot, and hand scrub is recommended for oily skin, dry skin, and everything in between. name: St. Ives Gentle Smoothing Face Scrub and Mask Oatmeal, ONE , 6 oz
short_description: It's 2-in-1. A gentle exfoliating face scrub to soften and smooth away dryness and a mask to instantly nourish skin
Made with 100% natural exfoliants
Our oats are harvested from oat grains grown in fields across the USA
We love oatmeal! Known for its soothing properties, creamy oatmeal helps you keep the peace with your mind, body, and soul.
Tell me more! This scrub and mask is oil free, paraben free, dermatologist tested and non-comedogenic (won’t clog pores). It is made with 100% natural exfoliants. Be sure to recycle upon disposal.
product_description: Our Gentle Smoothing Oatmeal Scrub & Mask is a 2-in-1! Enter the multi‐tasker: it works double time to smooth away dryness & even out your skin texture. Make the move to smooth! From America's #1 scrub brand, this smooth operator contains 100% natural exfoliants and works as a mask or scrub, leaving skin looking and feeling soft and supple. Good ol’ wholesome oatmeal has all sorts of good stuff going on. Our oatmeal comes from the US of A. A cool and moist climate suits those oats down to the ground. The whole oat kernel is ground into a fine powder. It’s then extracted with water, filtered and distilled. We love oatmeal! Known for its soothing properties, creamy oatmeal helps you keep the peace with your mind, body, and soul. And not forgetting our honey… The golden nectar is known to be a natural moisturizer and can help soothe dry itchy skin. Our honey comes from bees buzzing around the states of North and South Dakota in the USA. It goes through a careful process of extraction but rest assured no bees come to any harm under our watch. Natural Ingredients: Oatmeal extract Honey extract Walnut Shell Powder Hydrated Silica Tell me more! This scrub and mask is oil free, paraben free, dermatologist tested, and non-comedogenic (won’t clog pores). It is made with 100% natural exfoliants. Be sure to recycle upon disposal. Directions: Dispense product onto fingertips and massage over damp skin. Scrub: Spread in small circular motions then rinse off and glow! Mask: Leave on for 5-7 minutes, then gently massage and rinse off. For best results, use 3-4 times a week.
